description:
Meet Taylor, a recently turned 21 year old that is here to show off his hot body.
He tells us it pretty hot to think that many people will forever enjoy the show he puts on. We think he's hot.
Taylor is a part time student, trying to get his culinary degree. Apparently he likes to cook. When he's not at school, he's working part time at a sporting goods store. In high school, Taylor was the soccer teams MVP.
Watch Taylor in three scenes, as he admires his hot body in the kitchen, pleasures himself on the couch, and unloads his balls in the bathroom.
What a stud this young man is!
Enjoy!
title: Taylor
